document_data.name: Matteo
document_data.mainbody: '''Matteo''' was a shopkeeper in [[Phlan]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: Tall for a [[half-elf]] at nearly six feet, Matteo was well-muscled. He wore his reddish-black hair shaved on the sides in a mohawk with the tail descending past his shoulders.
document_data.Activities: Matteo was a weaponsmith located in the residential district. He was very talented but slow in his work.
